name: Wizard Cycle
description:
THE GAME:

You are a wizard, and your only goal is to defeat this dungeon.

CONTROLS:                                              

WASD -MOVE

LMB - SHOOT

MOUSE - AIM

E - INTERACT

Q - POTION

ESC - PAUSE
